TEXT.TITLE: FINANCIAL CORP <FIN> UNIT COMPLETES PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Financial Corp of America's American Savings and Loan Association said it completed the previously announced purchase of 16 retail savings branches from Great Western Financial Corp's <GWF> Great Western Savings. American Savings said the purchases boost its deposits by about 550 mln dlrs, but do not affect its asset base. Reuter
